# 法人税裁決DB（入り口 for AI）
# Base URL: https://yuki0717-hub.github.io/jplawdb-mirror/ai-hanketsu-db/saiketsu-houjinzei/

## 入口
- `llms.txt`

## URLパターン
- `llms.txt`
- `data/shards_index.json`
- `data/shards/shard-XX.txt`
- `core/{id}.txt`

## Search strategy
1. shards_index → target shard
2. open shard-XX.txt, find row with desired issue_hint/number
3. open `core/{id}.txt` as canonical per-decision summary
